entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 10 March 2023
